subject: re:Order now and don't forget about a discount
body:
Dear valued member.
Do you want to buy high quality products at lower price? Save on your drugs with MyCanadianPharmacy. 
High quality Canadian products for the price lower than for American drugs.Visit now. You have a chance to receive a Spring discount.
Just click here to check ithttp://brothergirl.hk
Our customers appreciate the level of our service and fast delivery.
Sincerely yours,Derek Bullard
